import React from 'react'; import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import data from '../data'; function ProductScreen(props) { const {id} = useParams() console.log(id) const product = data.products.find(x=>x._id === id) return
Back to Result

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews}) Reviews
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description :
    {product.description}
  • Price: {product.price}
  • Status: {product.status}
  • Qty:
} export default ProductScreen;
